text: Arden is an unincorporated community in Stevens County, Washington, United States. Arden is located on U.S. Route 395 south of Colville. It is served by Travel Washington's Gold Line, which runs between Spokane and Kettle Falls. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Stevens County, Washington Category:Unincorporated communities in Washington (state)
title: Arden, Washington
